fields.name: shares
docs: request shares of vault withdraw

fields.name: value
docs: requested value (in vault spot_market_index) of shares for withdraw

fields.name: ts
docs: request ts of vault withdraw

fields.name: vault
docs: The vault deposited into

fields.name: pubkey
docs: The vault depositor account's pubkey. It is a pda of vault

fields.name: mint
docs: The token mint for tokenized shares owned by this VaultDepositor

fields.name: vault_shares
docs: share of vault owned by this depositor. vault_shares / vault.total_shares is depositor's ownership of vault_equity

fields.name: last_vault_shares
docs: stores the vault_shares from the most recent liquidity event (redeem or issuance) before a spl token
CPI is done, used to track invariants

fields.name: last_valid_ts
docs: creation ts of vault depositor

fields.name: net_deposits
docs: lifetime net deposits of vault depositor for the vault

fields.name: total_deposits
docs: lifetime total deposits

fields.name: total_withdraws
docs: lifetime total withdraws

fields.name: cumulative_profit_share_amount
docs: the token amount of gains the vault depositor has paid performance fees on

fields.name: vault_shares_base
docs: The exponent for vault_shares decimal places at the time the tokenized vault depositor was initialized.
If the vault undergoes a rebase, this TokenizedVaultDepositor can no longer issue new tokens, only redeem
is possible.

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump for the vault pda

fields.name: vault
docs: The vault deposited into

fields.name: pubkey
docs: The vault depositor account's pubkey. It is a pda of vault and authority

fields.name: authority
docs: The authority is the address w permission to deposit/withdraw

fields.name: vault_shares
docs: share of vault owned by this depositor. vault_shares / vault.total_shares is depositor's ownership of vault_equity

fields.name: last_withdraw_request
docs: last withdraw request

fields.name: last_valid_ts
docs: creation ts of vault depositor

fields.name: net_deposits
docs: lifetime net deposits of vault depositor for the vault

fields.name: total_deposits
docs: lifetime total deposits

fields.name: total_withdraws
docs: lifetime total withdraws

fields.name: cumulative_profit_share_amount
docs: the token amount of gains the vault depositor has paid performance fees on

fields.name: vault_shares_base
docs: the exponent for vault_shares decimal places

fields.name: cumulative_fuel_per_share_amount
docs: precision: FUEL_SHARE_PRECISION

fields.name: fuel_amount
docs: precision: none

fields.name: protocol
docs: The protocol, company, or entity that services the product using this vault.
The protocol is not allowed to deposit into the vault but can profit share and collect annual fees just like the manager.

fields.name: protocol_profit_and_fee_shares
docs: The shares from profit share and annual fee unclaimed by the protocol.

fields.name: protocol_fee
docs: The annual fee charged on deposits by the protocol (traditional hedge funds typically charge 2% per year on assets under management).
Unlike the management fee this can't be negative.

fields.name: protocol_total_withdraws
docs: Total withdraws for the protocol

fields.name: protocol_total_fee
docs: Total fee charged by the protocol (annual management fee + profit share).
Unlike the management fee this can't be negative.

fields.name: protocol_total_profit_share
docs: Total profit share charged by the protocol

fields.name: protocol_profit_share
docs: Percentage the protocol charges on all profits realized by depositors: PERCENTAGE_PRECISION

fields.name: name
docs: The name of the vault. Vault pubkey is derived from this name.

fields.name: pubkey
docs: The vault's pubkey. It is a pda of name and also used as the authority for drift user

fields.name: manager
docs: The manager of the vault who has ability to update vault params

fields.name: token_account
docs: The vaults token account. Used to receive tokens between deposits and withdrawals

fields.name: user_stats
docs: The drift user stats account for the vault

fields.name: user
docs: The drift user account for the vault

fields.name: delegate
docs: The vaults designated delegate for drift user account
can differ from actual user delegate if vault is in liquidation

fields.name: liquidation_delegate
docs: The delegate handling liquidation for depositor

fields.name: user_shares
docs: The sum of all shares held by the users (vault depositors)

fields.name: total_shares
docs: The sum of all shares: deposits from users, manager deposits, manager profit/fee, and protocol profit/fee.
The manager deposits are total_shares - user_shares - protocol_profit_and_fee_shares.

fields.name: last_fee_update_ts
docs: Last fee update unix timestamp

fields.name: liquidation_start_ts
docs: When the liquidation starts

fields.name: redeem_period
docs: The period (in seconds) that a vault depositor must wait after requesting a withdrawal to finalize withdrawal.
Currently, the maximum is 90 days.

fields.name: total_withdraw_requested
docs: The sum of all outstanding withdraw requests

fields.name: max_tokens
docs: Max token capacity, once hit/passed vault will reject new deposits (updatable)

fields.name: management_fee
docs: The annual fee charged on deposits by the manager.
Traditional funds typically charge 2% per year on assets under management.

fields.name: init_ts
docs: Timestamp vault initialized

fields.name: net_deposits
docs: The net deposits for the vault

fields.name: manager_net_deposits
docs: The net deposits for the manager

fields.name: total_deposits
docs: Total deposits

fields.name: total_withdraws
docs: Total withdraws

fields.name: manager_total_deposits
docs: Total deposits for the manager

fields.name: manager_total_withdraws
docs: Total withdraws for the manager

fields.name: manager_total_fee
docs: Total management fee accrued by the manager

fields.name: manager_total_profit_share
docs: Total profit share accrued by the manager

fields.name: min_deposit_amount
docs: The minimum deposit amount

fields.name: shares_base
docs: The base 10 exponent of the shares (given massive share inflation can occur at near zero vault equity)

fields.name: profit_share
docs: Percentage the manager charges on all profits realized by depositors: PERCENTAGE_PRECISION

fields.name: hurdle_rate
docs: Vault manager only collect incentive fees during periods when returns are higher than this amount: PERCENTAGE_PRECISION

fields.name: spot_market_index
docs: The spot market index the vault deposits into/withdraws from

fields.name: bump
docs: The bump for the vault pda

fields.name: permissioned
docs: Whether anybody can be a depositor

fields.name: vault_protocol
docs: The optional [`VaultProtocol`] account.

fields.name: fuel_distribution_mode
docs: How fuel distribution should be treated [`FuelDistributionMode`]. Default is `UsersOnly`

fields.name: fee_update_status
docs: Whether the vault has a FeeUpdate account [`FeeUpdateStatus`]. Default is `FeeUpdateStatus::None`
After a `FeeUpdate` account is created and the manager has staged a fee update, the status is set to `PendingFeeUpdate`.
And instructsions that may finalize the fee update must include the `FeeUpdate` account with `remaining_accounts`.

fields.name: vault_class
docs: The class of the vault [`VaultClass`]. Default is `VaultClass::Normal`

fields.name: last_cumulative_fuel_per_share_ts
docs: The timestamp cumulative_fuel_per_share was last updated

fields.name: cumulative_fuel_per_share
docs: The cumulative fuel per share (scaled up by 1e6 to avoid losing precision)

fields.name: cumulative_fuel
docs: The total fuel accumulated

fields.name: manager_borrowed_value
docs: The total value (in deposit asset) of borrows the manager has outstanding.
Purely for informational purposes for assets that have left the vault that the manager
is expected to return.
